channel.title: Lldb on Software Musings
channel.description: Recent content in Lldb on Software Musings

item.title: Debugging Rust With Lldb
item.description: In this blog post I go over using lldb with rust and how get setup with lldb on Mac OS X. Installing lldb Read the official guide link on installing lldb. If you have a Mac then you should already have lldb installed. Notice that lldb reports the version of lldb and the version of swift. Various ways of Running Summation Program Let us look at a simple command line rust program that computes the summation provided as input.
